segments.text: I see the water flowing endlessly over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost mesmerizing, yet it signifies a crisis waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues to dry her dish, unfazed by the calamity brewing below her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of frustration growing within me for her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are dangerously close to disaster while she focuses on the mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if they are living in a bubble that she cannot see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the serene garden and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
